front.title: Applicability statement for edge to edge emulation of Time Division Multiplexing (TDM) services over Packet Switched Networks (PSN)

abstract.t: This document provides an applicability statement for the transport of TDM circuits over PSN. The document describes the various deployment scenarios and the recommended encapsulations and services to be used. In particular, it describes the scenarios applicable for SONET/SDH derived circuit emulation and scenarios applicable for native TDM emulation.
